checklist.notes: voice_ai/server.py created with Twilio integration. TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID, TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN, TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER all configured in .env
POST /voice/inbound endpoint returns TwiML connecting to ConversationRelay WebSocket. VoiceAISession manages conversation state.
POST /voice/outbound API endpoint initiates calls via Twilio client. Supports service follow-ups and appointment confirmations.
log_call_disposition tool captures: appointment_scheduled, information_provided, transferred_to_human, customer_callback_requested, wrong_number, spam
escalate_to_human tool with priority levels: normal, urgent, emergency. Emergency triggers immediate transfer with specific messaging.
voice_ai/server.py - Complete voice AI agent with 5 MEP tools: schedule_service_call, check_service_area, get_pricing_estimate, escalate_to_human, log_call_disposition

agents/dispatch_agent.py - Assigns technicians based on trade, location, availability. 5 tools: get_available_technicians, assign_technician, get_drive_time, check_technician_schedule, send_dispatch_notification
agents/collections_agent.py - AR follow-up with aging timeline. 5 tools: get_aging_report, send_payment_reminder, create_payment_plan, log_collection_activity, escalate_to_legal
agents/pm_scheduler_agent.py - Schedules PM visits per service plans. 5 tools: get_upcoming_pm_visits, schedule_pm_visit, send_appointment_reminder, check_compliance_deadlines, optimize_route
agents/quote_builder_agent.py - Good/Better/Best proposals. 6 tools: get_site_survey_data, calculate_equipment_sizing, get_equipment_pricing, lookup_rebates, calculate_roi, generate_proposal_pdf
66 clients verified in Instance 388
10 assets created across 4 MEP trades (MECHANICAL, ELECTRICAL, PLUMBING, LOW_VOLTAGE). Brands: Tesla, Generac, Carrier, Rheem, Hikvision, Enphase, Trane, Honeywell, Watts, SolarEdge

32 service plans configured across all MEP trades: HVAC (Bronze/Silver/Gold, Commercial PM), Fire (NFPA 25, Alarm, Extinguisher, Pump), Solar (O&M 1-5yr), Plumbing (Backflow, Grease, Home Shield), Electrical (Safety, Generator, UPS), plus multi-trade bundles
3 Field Work Orders exist: #1 Water Heater Leaking, #2 PM Visit - Quarterly HVAC, #3 Kitchen Hood Not Working. All HVAC Emergency Service Call type, Queued status

checklist.description: MCP tools verified against Coperniq API
checklist.notes: Verified via: (1) Playwright MCP - created 10 assets in Instance 388 via browser automation, (2) scripts/deploy_to_coperniq.py - REST API client for catalog items, financial docs, contacts. Both MCP patterns working.

13 Project Workflows verified in Process Studio, each with phase-based review gates. [KES] HVAC Residential Install has 10 phases (Initiationâ†’O&M) with templates/forms at each gate. All workflows use phase progression to enforce reviews.
Verified via Playwright MCP browser automation - created 10 assets in Coperniq Instance 388 directly from Claude Code CLI
chat_ui/app.py - Streamlit chat interface with agent dashboard, quick actions, Claude integration. Run: streamlit run chat_ui/app.py. Shows all 5 agents status, active calls, open work orders.
.claude/ directory IS the plugin architecture: skills/, agents/, commands/tm/ with 50+ Task Master commands, skill-factory with templates. Extensible by design.
config/template_registry.json - Machine-readable catalog for AI agents with all trades, certifications, market segments, and 58+ templates indexed.
config/trade-automations/ includes WEBHOOK trigger types for external monitoring platforms (e.g., Solar Low Production Alert). 9 automations verified in Process Studio.
